summary: Aunt Mei's famous homemade dumplings provide amazing age-defying qualities popular with middle-aged women. But her latest customer - a fading actress - is determined to find out what the secret ingredient is.
cast: Pauline Lau|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Bai Ling|Meme Tian|So-Foon Wong|Miki Yeung|Miriam Chin Wah Yeung
keywords: dumpling|hotel|looking at oneself in a mirror|rejuvenation|abortion
title: Gau ji
